en.title: Upload supporting documents
en.line1: You must send a copy of the Authority's Review decision letter with the completed tribunal form.
en.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.
en.uploadGuidance: Once you have selected the file click "Upload file" to upload it.

cy.title: Upload supporting documents - (Welsh)
cy.line1: You must send a copy of the Authority's Review decision letter with the completed tribunal form. - (Welsh)
cy.uploadRequirement:
• File formats: MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF
  • File size per document: up to 20 megabytes (MB)
  • Files cannot be password protected

You can’t upload executable (.exe), .zip or other archive files due to virus risks.

(Welsh)
cy.uploadGuidance: Once you have selected the file click "Upload file" to upload it. (Welsh)

en.SIZE_ERROR: File size exceeds 20Mb. Please upload a file that is less than 20Mb
en.FORMAT_ERROR: This service only accepts files in the formats - MS Word, MS Excel, PDF, JPG, PNG, TXT, RTF
en.TOTAL_FILES_EXCEED_ERROR: You can upload 5 files only. Please delete one of the uploaded files and retry
en.CONTINUE_WITHOUT_UPLOAD_ERROR: You cannot continue without uploading supporting documentation
en.NO_FILE_UPLOAD_ERROR: Please choose a file to upload
en.UPLOAD_DELETE_FAIL_ERROR: Document upload or deletion has failed. Please try again
